statements: SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, booking_date FROM reservations WHERE status='confirmed';
SELECT reservation_id, start_time, end_time, booking_date FROM reservations WHERE customer_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, start_time, end_time FROM reservations WHERE status='pending' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE status='Confirmed' ORDER BY booking_date DESC, start_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, booking_date FROM reservations WHERE start_time BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '14:00:00'
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_reservations DESC
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE booking_date > '2022-01-01' AND status='Pending' ORDER BY booking_date ASC
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, start_time, end_time FROM reservations WHERE status='Cancelled'
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, user_id FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT user_id, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT availability_id, room_id, available_date FROM availability WHERE available_status = 'available';
SELECT room_id, available_date FROM availability ORDER BY available_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, user_id, booking_status FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT booking_id, user_id, booking_status, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY booking_id;
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE room_id = 101 AND available_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY available_date ASC;
SELECT availability_id, room_id, available_date, available_status FROM availability WHERE available_status = 'available' ORDER BY available_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT room_number, room_type, capacity FROM rooms WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, room_number, reservation_status FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_out_date, room_number, total_amount FROM reservations WHERE reservation_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, total_amount FROM reservations WHERE reservation_status = 'Paid' AND check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_number, room_type, capacity, price_per_night FROM rooms WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY price_per_night DESC;
SELECT guest_name, room_type, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings b JOIN rooms r ON b.room_number = r.room_number WHERE r.capacity >= 2 ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE status='confirmed';
SELECT customer_name, booking_date, booking_time FROM bookings WHERE booking_date='2022-09-15';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT property_name, property_address, capacity FROM properties WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE status='available' AND available_date='2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT customer_name, booking_date, booking_time FROM bookings WHERE booking_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_name, property_address, capacity FROM properties ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE status = 'Available' AND available_date >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY available_date ASC, available_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, room_id FROM bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_id, room_name, room_type, price FROM rooms ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT platform_name, last_sync_date FROM sync_status WHERE platform_name = 'Example Platform';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, room_type, price FROM rooms WHERE price > 100;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, customer_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT platform_name, last_sync_date FROM sync_status WHERE platform_name LIKE 'Google%';
SELECT room_name, price, available_date FROM rooms r JOIN availability a ON r.room_id = a.room_id WHERE price < 200 AND available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY available_date DESC;
